com.google.android.exoplayer2.testutil

Class ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.testutil.ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ExoPlayerTestRunner 

    public static final class ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder to set-up a ExoPlayerTestRunner. Default fake implementations will be used for unset test properties.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder.PlayerFactory
      Factory to create an SimpleExoPlayer instance.

    • Method Detail

      • setTimeline

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setTimeline(Timeline timeline)
        Sets a Timeline to be used by a FakeMediaSource in the test runner. The default value is a seekable, non-dynamic FakeTimeline with a duration of FakeTimeline.TimelineWindowDefinition.DEFAULT_WINDOW_DURATION_US. Setting the timeline is not allowed after a call to setMediaSource(MediaSource).
        Parameters:
        timeline - A Timeline to be used by a FakeMediaSource in the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setManifest

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setManifest(java.lang.Object manifest)
        Sets a manifest to be used by a FakeMediaSource in the test runner. The default value is null. Setting the manifest is not allowed after a call to setMediaSource(MediaSource).
        Parameters:
        manifest - A manifest to be used by a FakeMediaSource in the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setMediaSource

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setMediaSource(MediaSource mediaSource)
        Sets a MediaSource to be used by the test runner. The default value is a FakeMediaSource with the timeline and manifest provided by setTimeline(Timeline) and setManifest(Object). Setting the media source is not allowed after calls to setTimeline(Timeline) and/or setManifest(Object).
        Parameters:
        mediaSource - A MediaSource to be used by the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setTrackSelector

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setTrackSelector(MappingTrackSelector trackSelector)
        Sets a MappingTrackSelector to be used by the test runner. The default value is a DefaultTrackSelector.
        Parameters:
        trackSelector - A MappingTrackSelector to be used by the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setLoadControl

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setLoadControl(LoadControl loadControl)
        Sets a LoadControl to be used by the test runner. The default value is a DefaultLoadControl.
        Parameters:
        loadControl - A LoadControl to be used by the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setSupportedFormats

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setSupportedFormats(Format... supportedFormats)
        Sets a list of Formats to be used by a FakeMediaSource to create media periods and for setting up a FakeRenderer. The default value is a single VIDEO_FORMAT. Note that this parameter doesn't have any influence if both a media source with setMediaSource(MediaSource) and renderers with setRenderers(Renderer...) or setRenderersFactory(RenderersFactory) are set.
        Parameters:
        supportedFormats - A list of supported Formats.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setRenderers

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setRenderers(Renderer... renderers)
        Sets the Renderers to be used by the test runner. The default value is a single FakeRenderer supporting the formats set by setSupportedFormats(Format...). Setting the renderers is not allowed after a call to setRenderersFactory(RenderersFactory).
        Parameters:
        renderers - A list of Renderers to be used by the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setRenderersFactory

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setRenderersFactory(RenderersFactory renderersFactory)
        Sets the RenderersFactory to be used by the test runner. The default factory creates all renderers set by setRenderers(Renderer...). Setting the renderer factory is not allowed after a call to setRenderers(Renderer...).
        Parameters:
        renderersFactory - A RenderersFactory to be used by the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setExoPlayer

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setExoPlayer(ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder.PlayerFactory playerFactory)
        Sets the ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder.PlayerFactory which creates the SimpleExoPlayer to be used by the test runner. The default value is a SimpleExoPlayer with the renderers provided by setRenderers(Renderer...) or setRenderersFactory(RenderersFactory), the track selector provided by setTrackSelector(MappingTrackSelector) and the load control provided by setLoadControl(LoadControl).
        Parameters:
        playerFactory - A ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder.PlayerFactory to create the player.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setActionSchedule

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setActionSchedule(ActionSchedule actionSchedule)
        Sets an ActionSchedule to be run by the test runner. The first action will be executed immediately before SimpleExoPlayer.prepare(MediaSource).
        Parameters:
        actionSchedule - An ActionSchedule to be used by the test runner.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • setEventListener

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder setEventListener(Player.EventListener eventListener)
        Sets an Player.EventListener to be registered to listen to player events.
        Parameters:
        eventListener - A Player.EventListener to be registered by the test runner to listen to player events.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • build

        public ExoPlayerTestRunner build()
        Builds an ExoPlayerTestRunner using the provided values or their defaults.
        Returns:
        The built ExoPlayerTestRunner.
